definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: When the article arrived, the editor read the first sentence and then refused to publish it.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄來後，編輯看第一句話就拒絕予以發表。

sentences.english: C-E:when the article arrived, the editor refused to publish it when he read the first sentence.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄來後，這個編輯讀了第一句話就不讓發表了。

sentences.english: Afternoon to the computer room to the classroom teacher can design speech.
sentences.chinese: 下午去電腦房教室給老師看設計稿子。

sentences.english: You should get someone to proof read your work before submission to the supervisor.
sentences.chinese: 在嚮導師提交之前，你應當找人先校一下你的稿子。

sentences.english: Thank you FOR the trouble you have taken in reading over the manuscript FOR me.
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你不厭其煩地替我審閱這個稿子。

sentences.english: This famous editor has the habit of reading articles aloud.
sentences.chinese: 這個名編輯有個習慣，愛把稿子念出聲來。

sentences.english: The master copy was too light, so many of the copies didn't come out clear.
sentences.chinese: 蠟紙底稿打得太輕，所以許多印出來的稿子看不清楚。

sentences.english: Special to find Vincent, ask why the red fruits of draft of smoke lost.
sentences.chinese: 特殊去找文森，問爲什麼把紅果的稿子抽失落。

sentences.english: Having finished A Cadre School Life: Six Chapters, Yang Jiang sent me the script.
sentences.chinese: 楊絳寫完《幹校六記》，把稿子給我看了一遍。

sentences.english: I reported it all in my story and faxed it back to my editor.
sentences.chinese: 我全面報道了這一切，然後將稿子傳真給主編。

sentences.english: Last of all, the chief editor read it and approved it.
sentences.chinese: 最後主編審讀了這篇稿子，並批准發表了。

sentences.english: So I wrote a lecture on that subject.
sentences.chinese: 所以我就此寫了一篇稿子。

sentences.english: “Sorry,” he said.“We don't need a weekly story.
sentences.chinese: “對不起，”他說，“我們不需要每週一篇稿子。

sentences.english: He drew a bulky manuscript from his outside coat pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他從外衣口袋掏出了一大摞稿子。

sentences.english: I do TVs as well. But I can't just read the scripts and pick the songs.
sentences.chinese: 我也上電視，但是我不喜歡只是讀稿子選音樂。

sentences.english: She contributed an article to our magazine.
sentences.chinese: 她給我們的雜誌投了一篇稿子。

definition: paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
